General.Name: Silver Range Resources Ltd
General.Description: Silver Range Resources Ltd., a junior resource exploration company, engages in the acquisition, exploration, and evaluation of precious metal resources in Canada. The company explores for gold, silver, zinc, lead, and copper deposits. Its property portfolio comprises mineral properties located in Nevada, the Northwest Territories, Nunavut, and the Yukon Territory. Silver Range Resources Ltd. was incorporated in 2010 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1100 Melville Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 4A6
